amendment.description: To require a report on the United States strategy for reconstruction in Iraq.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1273 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 283.
Amendment SA 1273 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S9464-9471; text: CR S9464) To require a report on the United States strategy for reconstruction in Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1273 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1273 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 283.
